E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 6/16/1990
Subject: Progress of Larry Casian
Dear Sir,
Larry Casian has an ERA of 2.14 at AA Arkansas Travelers!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Sunday, 6/22/1990
Subject: Progress of Russ Springer
Dear Sir,
Russ Springer has nothing more to prove at A St. Petersburg Cardinals!
He has an ERA of 3.00 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 6/25/1990
Subject: Dave Hollins learns new position
Dave Hollins has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Saturday, 6/28/1990
Subject: Progress of Matt Whisenant
Dear Sir,
Matt Whisenant is doing pretty good at A St. Petersburg Cardinals!
He has an ERA of 3.81, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
